price: 他们阻碍安拉的大道，并试图歪曲它，而且他们是不信后世的。
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
